# Generic personas

#### Targeted generic personas
The targeted personas for this DAK are the end-users of the HMIS systems that interact with the Interoperability layer (IOL) and Shared Health Record (SHR) for the purpose of patient information sharing between healthcare providers. This includes **registration personell**, **ANC nurses** and **doctors**.
